trans-unit.source: Represents the resolution supported by a printer.

This class is used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutions%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterResolution%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties to get the printer resolutions that are available on the printer and to set the printing resolution for a page, respectively.

Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> property to determine whether the printer resolution type is the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> value <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind>.

If so, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Y%2A> properties to determine the printer resolution in the horizontal and vertical directions, respectively.
For more information on printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution"></xref> class.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> class.
|Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind>|
Gets or sets the printer resolution.
One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind"></xref> values.
The value assigned is not a member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind"></xref> enumeration.
This member overrides the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
A <xref:System.String> that contains information about the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution"></xref>.
Gets the horizontal printer resolution, in dots per inch.
`dmPrintQuality` is a member of the `DEVMODE` (device mode) structure, which defines constants that map to printer quality settings.

The X property contains the value `DMRES_HIGH` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind>, `DMRES_MEDIUM` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind>, `DMRES_LOW` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind>, and `DMRES_DRAFT` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind>.
For more information about the `DEVMODE` structure, see the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

The horizontal printer resolution, in dots per inch, if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind*> is set to <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind"></xref>; otherwise, a <xref uid="langword_csharp_dmPrintQuality" name="dmPrintQuality" href=""></xref> value.
Gets the vertical printer resolution, in dots per inch.
If the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind>, the default value of the Y property is -1.
The vertical printer resolution, in dots per inch.
